tasks.title: Welcome to Mission Control!
tasks.description:
This is a sample task to help you get started.

**Getting Started:**
1. Connect your GitHub token (repo scope)
2. Create your first task with the + button
3. Drag tasks between columns

Your AI assistant can also create and manage tasks via chat!
